attributes.action: Pay parents/carers lost earnings if suitable school provision not provided
attributes.additional_details: Families should not be plunged into crisis and hardship because the local authority cannot provide suitable school provision.
attributes.background: It is a legal responsibility for local authorities to provide a suitable education for a child. If a suitable school provision cannot be provided and parents/carers need to take unpaid leave or leave their jobs to look after their child, loss of earnings should be paid whilst the child is home.
